Subject: Without DLP system Network Share not work
Description:
I wanted to bring to your attention that the network share functionality is not working without the DLP (Data Loss Prevention) system in place.
I wanted to discuss the network share scenario we previously had working on server version 5.9.3. However, I’ve encountered some issues that I’d like to address.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer will update the EPP server in April, to 5.9.4.1 and check if the situation persist.
Account_Name__c: Tech Elecon Pvt. Ltd. (Elecon Engineering Group)
